title.narrative: Climate Resilient Infrastructure Development Facility (CRIDF) Phase 2

description.narrative: This activity (Climate Resilient Infrastructure Development Facility (CRIDF) Phase 2) is a component of Transboundary Water Management in Southern Africa reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £21,940,114. This component benefits South of Sahara, regional, and works in the following sector(s): Water sector policy and administrative management, River basins development, Environmental policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: WYG International. The start date is 15-04-2017 and the end date is 31-03-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
